data.message: Hello M. Mathers,I'm Angelinna and I feel like writing you in terrible circumstances,I horribly cry and suffer by writing these words. I want you to feel my pain like yours,as much as your alive body can feel. I'm sick since I was born,I had three cardiac arrest this year and five cardiac arrest the last year and two years of coma because of two CVA. And since I'm born,I sleep 14 hours by days and can't sometimes take my shower alone or wake me up for all the day. I learned that I'm actually dying. But don't want to make exhibition of my situation,just for told you that I found your recovery Album and it really give me a lot during my hilness. It's not usually rap, and after listened so many rappers,I think that Eminem is really different in the point of Eminem really touch my heart where others never made it. You write with a way,intensly way,and I think nobody can't be indiffrent by this writens. Thank you for All you give to your listeners. For the rap,and take Care of You In this crazy world. And before Dying, I really wanted to see you just for aperceive the writer of this amazing Recovery Album,but Whatever,I want you to take care of you and your talent,cause you really have something deep that others rappers haven't got. Do you up on stages this times?
